alert.note: Alert for Chase (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Chase County through 345 PM MDT... At 257 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Champion, or near Imperial, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Lamar, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Champion, Enders, Crete, Chase, Center Dam Campground, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area, Area A Campground and Church Grove Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
